member.name: T:R5T.T0154.DraftRazorComponentMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Attribute indicating a type is a draft Razor component. Draft Razor component types are quickly created functionality that should be reviewed and relocated, and thus full become Razor component types. It's usually pretty clear that something is a Razor component, but the marker attribute is useful for surveying assemblies and code, then building a catalogue of draft Razor components as a kind of TODO list.

member.name: P:R5T.T0154.DraftRazorComponentMarkerAttribute.IsDraftRazorComponent
member.summary: Allows specifying that a type is *not* a draft Razor component type. This is useful for marking types that end up canonical draft Razor component code file locations, but are not actually draft Razor components.

member.name: T:R5T.T0154.RazorComponentMarkerAttribute
member.summary: Attribute indicating a type is a Razor component. It's usually pretty clear that something is a Razor component, but the marker attribute is useful for surveying assemblies and code, then building a catalogue of Razor components.

member.name: P:R5T.T0154.RazorComponentMarkerAttribute.IsRazorComponent
member.summary: Allows specifying that a type is *not* a Razor component type. This is useful for marking types that end up canonical Razor component code file locations, but are not actually Razor components.

member.name: T:R5T.T0154.Documentation
member.summary: Razor component marker attribute and interface.

member.name: T:R5T.T0154.IDraftRazorComponentMarker
member.summary: Marker interface for types that are draft Razor component types. Allows methods-for, and extension methods-on, all types that are draft Razor component types.

member.name: T:R5T.T0154.IRazorComponentMarker
member.summary: Marker interface for types that are Razor component types. Allows methods-for, and extension methods-on, all types that are Razor component types.
